attributes.action: reverse the decision to ban the Red Arrows from performing in the opening ceremony of the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Olympic organizers have made the outrageous decision to ban our legendary Red Arrows from the opening 2012 ceremony because they are too British, and might offend other nations!
This is a prime example of PC Britain gone mad, and something needs to be done.
The Red Arrows are the world's finest precision flying display team, famed and loved throughout the globe, and would be a fantastic tribute to the games.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
